SAS Common Utils

SAS Common Utils This is the SAS Common Utils API Documentation.

Packages 
Package Description
com.maddox.sas1946.il2.util  

SAS Common Utils

This is the SAS Common Utils API Documentation.

The SAS Common Utils are designed to provide some easy-to-use methods for java modders in order to get access to formerly hidden features of IL-2 and to make life easier when developing mods which are intended to run flawlessly on multiple different base game versions.
Please feel free to redistribute these Utilities as much as you like, they're provided under the DWTFYWWI public license.
The only thing we'd like to ask you is to send back the changes you might apply to this package so we can merge them together in an "official" release.

Yours sincerely
The SAS Modders
